com.se_project.controllers

Class CourseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.se_project.controllers.CourseController

  • @Controller
public class CourseController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the controller functions that link between the course model and its views.

      CourseController()

      this function takes teacher id and returns HTML page of the course form that is used in creating new course by this teacher

      this function takes a course data from a teacher and creates it
      java.lang.String deleteCourse(java.lang.String teacher_id, long cid, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      this function delete a specific course
      java.lang.String getCourse(java.lang.String user_id, long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      this function get all the games of a specific course and show it in the course page
      java.lang.String showCoursesByCategory(java.lang.String category, java.lang.String user_id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      this function shows the courses by category, every category has courses so it shows the courses of the chosen category by a user (teacher or student), it also shows all the courses if the user choose "All Categories" option

      this function returns HTML page of the courses of a specific teacher that is created by him

    • Method Detail

      • CourseForm

        @RequestMapping(value="/{teacher_id}/create_course_form",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String CourseForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                           @PathVariable
                                                                                                                           java.lang.String teacher_id,
                                                                                                                           com.se_project.models.Course course)
        this function takes teacher id and returns HTML page of the course form that is used in creating new course by this teacher
        Parameters:
        model - used to add teacher_id to HTML element
        teacher_id - used to identify the teacher over the system
        course - object of the course that is created by the teacher
        Returns:
        HTML page that shows course form

      • ShowMyCourses

        @RequestMapping(value="/{teacher_id}/ShowMyCourses",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String ShowMyCourses(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String teacher_id,
                                                                                                                         org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        this function returns HTML page of the courses of a specific teacher that is created by him
        Parameters:
        teacher_id - identifing the teacher through the system
        model - used to add the courses attributes and the id of a specific teacher to HTML elements in a HTML page
        Returns:
        HTML page of teacher's courses

      • CreateCourse

        @RequestMapping(value="/{teacher_id}/create_course_form",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String CreateCourse(@RequestParam(value="imagefile")
                                                                                                                              org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile imagefile,
                                                                                                                              @PathVariable
                                                                                                                              java.lang.String teacher_id,
                                                                                                                              com.se_project.models.Course course,
                                                                                                                              org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult,
                                                                                                                              org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        this function takes a course data from a teacher and creates it
        Parameters:
        imagefile - holds the path of the image of the course added by a teacher (is chosen by the teacher)
        teacher_id - identifing the teacher through the system
        course - object of the course that is created by a specific teacher
        bindingResult - checks if the user input has errors
        model - used to add the course attributes to HTML elements
        Returns:
        HTML page of the course if the course creation is successful or HTML page of the create Course form if the data entered is wrong

      • showCoursesByCategory

        @RequestMapping(value="/user/{user_id}/{category}")
public java.lang.String showCoursesByCategory(@PathVariable
                                                                                                   java.lang.String category,
                                                                                                   @PathVariable
                                                                                                   java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                   org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        this function shows the courses by category, every category has courses so it shows the courses of the chosen category by a user (teacher or student), it also shows all the courses if the user choose "All Categories" option
        Parameters:
        category - holds the category name that is unique through the system
        user_id - holds the user id that identifies the user through the system
        model - add the course attributes to HTML elements of the HTML page of the user home-page, and the user id
        Returns:
        HTML page of a user (teacher or student) home-page

      • getCourse

        @RequestMapping(value="/{user_id}/Course/{id}")
public java.lang.String getCourse(@PathVariable
                                                                                   java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                   @PathVariable
                                                                                   long id,
                                                                                   org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        this function get all the games of a specific course and show it in the course page
        Parameters:
        user_id - identifies user through the system
        id - identifies course through the system
        model - add the course attributes and the games attributes to a HTML page
        Returns:
        HTML page of a specific course to a teacher or to the student the first if condition returns the page of a course owned by specefic teacher and the second one returns the page course to a student

      • deleteCourse

        @RequestMapping(value="/{teacher_id}/DeleteCourse/{cid}")
public java.lang.String deleteCourse(@PathVariable
                                                                                                java.lang.String teacher_id,
                                                                                                @PathVariable
                                                                                                long cid,
                                                                                                org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        this function delete a specific course
        Parameters:
        teacher_id - identifies a teacher through the system
        cid - identifies a course through the system
        model -
        Returns:
        HTML page of the teacher courses

      • Validate

        public boolean Validate(java.lang.String course_name)
        this function checks the course name if it's already exists or not
        Parameters:
        course_name - holds the course name
        Returns:
        boolean true if the course name is already in the system
